original_text: But then God, our Saviour, showed clearly that he is very kind. He showed that he loves all people.
korean_text: 우리 구주 하나님의 자비와 사람 사랑하심이 나타날 때에

sentences.original_text: showed clearly that he is very kind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 매우 자비롭다는 것을 분명히 보여주셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He showed that he loves all people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 사람을 사랑한다는 것을 보여주셨습니다.
